headline: Netflix Billionaire Reed Hastings Gives $2 Million In California Map Fight
summary: The billionaire is one of the most prominent names so far to stand behind Newsom in his controversial plan to redraw congressional maps.  Hastings is a long-time Newsom backer and gave $3 million as the largest individual donor in the governor’s 2021 fight against a recall.

raw.headline: Netflix Billionaire Reed Hastings Gives $2 Million In California Map Fight

headline: How Netflix reinvented cable for the streaming era
summary: On Netflix's 28th "birthday," it looks more like cable than a disruptor — with primetime nights, bundles, ads, and even a channel guide of its own

headline: Netflix Co-CEO to Present at the Goldman Sachs Communacopia + Technology Conference
summary: Netflix, Inc. (Nasdaq: NFLX) announced today that its Co-CEO, Greg Peters, will present at the Goldman Sachs Communacopia + Technology Conference on Monday, September 8th, 2025. Mr. Peters is scheduled to present at 1:05 p.m. Pacific Time / 4:05 p.m. Eastern Time.

headline: Is Netflix a Trillion-Dollar Company?
summary: Is Netflix on its way to a trillion-dollar valuation? Here's what it would take to get there, and how much you should care about this nice, round target value.

headline: Netflix: Shares Are Getting Perilously Close To Warranting A Downgrade
summary: Netflix shows strong revenue and profit growth with rising margins, but a stretched valuation limits upside despite solid execution. Learn why NFLX stock is a hold.

headline: JPMorgan Remains Neutral on Netflix (NFLX) Despite Better Operational Momentum
summary: Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) is one of the most profitable tech stocks to invest in now. On August 17, JPMorgan’s Doug Anmuth reaffirmed a Neutral rating on Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) with a $1,300 price target. He pointed out that while management lifted its 2025 revenue guidance, some headwinds remain. Viewership remains affected by paid-sharing initiatives and earlier […]
